prompt_text: Illustration tile inspired by Harlequin gecko markings, with high-contrast cream and brown side patterning, organic irregular patches, natural mottling and very soft scale-like texture. Warm earth tones with gentle gradients, editorial naturalistic look without realism. Soft beige background.

Illustration tile inspired by Flame gecko dorsal patterning, with warm terracotta, orange and golden tones forming upward flame-like shapes over a darker brown base. Smooth natural transitions, subtle mottling, gentle scale hints, warm organic flow.

Illustration tile inspired by Pinstripe gecko patterning featuring two clean parallel cream or yellow dorsal lines on a medium brown base. Soft edges, slight irregularity, gentle natural gradients and minimal skin texture.

Illustration tile inspired by Reverse Pinstripe geckos, featuring two darker parallel stripes running along a lighter tan or cream dorsal field. Soft organic banding with gentle mottling and subtle texture.

Abstract Dalmatian gecko pattern tile with scattered irregular dark spots on a warm cream or tan base. Natural variation in spot size, soft edges, subtle mottling and minimal scale impressions. Warm, natural editorial look.

Dense spotted pattern tile inspired by Super Dalmatian geckos, with many irregular dark spots of varied sizes over a cream background. High density but natural distribution, soft edges and organic mottling.

Illustration tile inspired by Tiger gecko vertical striping, featuring layered irregular brown and tan stripes with soft edges, natural blending, and subtle mottling. Gentle reptile-skin texture without realism.
Abstract Brindle gecko pattern tile with broken vertical stripe fragments, overlapping warm browns and sand tones. Soft blended gradients, natural mottling, gentle scale-like texture.
Tile representing Quadstripe gecko patterning: four parallel cream lines (two dorsal, two lateral) on a medium brown base. Soft organic geometry, natural unevenness, warm editorial texture.
Low-contrast Phantom gecko pattern tile with muted brown and cream tones blending softly into each other. Very subtle markings, gentle gradients, natural mottling, quiet and understated aesthetic.
High-contrast Lilly White inspired tile with bright ivory and white rounded patches layered on a warm tan or light brown base. Smooth organic shapes, gentle transitions, soft reptile-skin texture.
Tricolor gecko pattern tile featuring harmonized layers of warm brown, golden yellow and cream. Organic irregular shapes, distinct yet soft color transitions, natural mottling and subtle texture.

Bold Extreme Harlequin inspired tile with strong contrast between bright cream, yellow and dark brown patches. Dynamic organic shapes, pronounced mottling, soft reptile-skin impression while staying non-realistic.
